title: Bayaan
summary: When an anonymous letter accuses a revered cult leader of abuse, rookie detective Roohi is sent to a small Indian town to investigate. Confronted by blind devotion, she must break through the wall of silence and uncover the truth.
stars: Huma Qureshi, Chandrachur Singh, Sachin Khedekar

title: Ranarangam
summary: Deva (Sharwanand) is a powerful gangster from Visakhapatnam who moves to Spain to put his past behind him. But what happens when he realises he can't shake off his enemies no matter where he goes?
stars: Sharwanand, Kajal Aggarwal, Kalyani Priyadarshan

title: Chalte Chalte
summary: A man pursues a woman who is already engaged and eventually gets married to her. Differences between the two lead to a bitter separation that threatens to destroy their relationship forever.
stars: Shah Rukh Khan, Rani Mukerji, Jas Arora

title: Maryan
summary: A contract worker in Sudan is abducted by mercenaries and his lover in India awaits his return.
stars: Dhanush, Parvathy Thiruvothu, Salim Kumar

title: Kaadan
summary: Kaadan is a true-blue animal film signifying a deep and strong bond between humans and animals.
stars: Srinath Alnath, Raghu Babu, Rana Daggubati

title: Yolo
summary: Shiva finds himself mysteriously wedded to Deekshitha, a stranger. As they seek answers about their unexpected union, they unwittingly stumble into a chilling mystery that defies explanation.
stars: Devika Satheesh, Swati Nair, Giri Dwarakish

title: Etharkkum Thunindhavan
summary: A lawyer turns judge jury and executioner and goes after a gang, led by a minister's son, that threatens women with videos of them.
stars: Suriya, Priyanka Arulmohan, Sathyaraj

title: Naramedh Yagna
stars: Ajit Bandyopadhyay, Mihir Bhattacharya, Tulsi Chakraborty

title: Chal Mohan Ranga
summary: Mohan Ranga falls in love with Megha Subramanyam, an NRI residing in the United States. Before she can reciprocate his love, circumstances make them fall apart. But destiny has other plans.
stars: Nithiin, Megha Akash, Madhunandan

title: Toh Lagi Sharat
summary: A bet between two friends turns so ugly giving rise to vengeance and deception where every one of them revolving around the incident is pulled in the spider's web, making every one of them a suspect and everyone has a reason to kill.
stars: Ronit Vaidya, Priyank Gajjar, Jignesh Modi

title: Anartha
summary: With the backdrop of serial suspected suicides ,Avakash and Akruthi, go to a secluded place. will Avakash or Akruthi become the next victim or will inspector Advaith find the person responsible?
stars: Ganesh Ds, Vishal Mannur, Rakshith
